privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.policy_intro: The DEMEU platform is designed to provide transparent and secure charitable assistance. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting any personal data you provide when using our platform.
privacy.usage_title: How do we use your data?
privacy.access_title: Who has access to your data?
privacy.access_text: Only authorized DEMEU staff and automated systems have access to your data. We never share your personal data without your permission unless required by law.
privacy.protect_title: How do we protect your data?
